mapper.select: select a.qcCode, b.prodCode, d.shipSdate, b.woCode, b.productCode, e.productName, b.prodCount, a.qcTest1, a.qcTest2, a.qcTest3, a.qcPass, a.qcDefect, a.qcDefectRate, a.qcStatus, a.qcEmpId, f.empName as qcEmpName, a.qcStartDate, a.qcEndDate from production b left join qualityControl a on b.prodCode = a.prodCode left join workOrder c on b.woCode = c.woCode left join receivedOrder d on d.roCode = c.roCode left join product e on b.productCode = e.productCode left join employees f on a.qcEmpId = f.empId order by qcCode desc

select b.woCode, b.prodCode, b.productCode, e.productName, b.empId as prodEmpId, (select empName from employees where empId = b.empId) as prodEmpName, d.shipSdate, a.qcTest1, a.qcTest2, a.qcTest3, b.prodCount, a.qcPass, a.qcDefect, a.qcDefectRate, a.qcCode, a.qcEmpId, (select empName from employees where empId = a.qcEmpId) as qcEmpName, a.qcStartDate, a.qcEndDate, a.qcStatus from production b left join qualityControl a on b.prodCode = a.prodCode left join workOrder c on b.woCode = c.woCode left join receivedOrder d on d.roCode = c.roCode left join product e on b.productCode = e.productCode where b.prodCode = #{prodCode}
mapper.insert: insert into qualityControl (qcCode, prodCode, qcEmpId, qcStartDate, qcStatus, qcTest1, qcTest2, qcTest3, qcPass, qcDefect) values (CONCAT('QC', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d%H%i%s')), #{prodCode}, #{qcEmpId}, now(), #{qcStatus}, #{qcTest1}, #{qcTest2}, #{qcTest3}, #{qcPass}, #{qcDefect})
mapper.update: UPDATE qualityControl SET qcTest1 = #{qcTest1}, qcTest2 = #{qcTest2}, qcTest3 = #{qcTest3}, qcPass = #{qcPass}, qcDefect = #{qcDefect}, qcDefectRate = #{qcDefectRate}, qcEmpId = #{qcEmpId}, qcEndDate = #{qcEndDate}, qcStatus = #{qcStatus} WHERE prodCode = #{prodCode}
